name: @moxie-protocol/plugin-moxie-autonomous-trading
author: Senpi
description: Have Senpi automatically buy and sell tokens for you when specific conditions are met!
capabilities: Copy Trade specific user(s)
Copy Trade a group
Buy when they buy + Sell when they sell
Buy when they buy + Sell when price achieved
Buy when they buy, but only if marketcap is within specific range
Buy when they buy, buy only if token was created within specific range
**New! Set stop loss!**
Sophisticated combinations
Notes:
You can view all your open Auto-Trade rules in the Autonomous Trades section of the dashboard
The Orders page also includes a tab for executed Auto-Trades
“Sell when they sell” will currently sell 100% of your tokens purchased in the auto-trade when they sell 50% of theirs. You’ll be able to adjust these settings in a future release.
Stop loss will attempt to sell 5 times once the target is achieved. Actual sale price may vary somewhat from target on extremely volatile tokens.

starterQuestions.label: If any 2 people in #copytrade buy >$500 of a token within 10 minutes of each other, buy me $100 of it. Set stop loss to 10%.
starterQuestions.value: If any 2 people in #[copytrade|COPYTRADE_ID] buy >$500 of a token within 10 minutes of each other, buy me $100 of it. Set stop loss to 10%.

starterQuestions.label: If any 2 people in #copytrade buy >$1000 of a token within 10 minutes of each other, buy me $100 of it, and then sell all of it for 30% profit. Set stop loss at 10%.
starterQuestions.value: If any 2 people in #[copytrade|COPYTRADE_ID] buy >$1000 of a token within 10 minutes of each other, buy me $100 of it, and then sell all of it for 30% profit. Set stop loss at 10%.

starterQuestions.label: If any 2 people in #copytrade buy >$2000 of a token within 10 minutes of each other, buy me $100 of it, and then sell all of it when 1 of them sell 50%. Set stop loss to 10%.
starterQuestions.value: If any 2 people in #[copytrade|COPYTRADE_ID] buy >$2000 of a token within 10 minutes of each other, buy me $100 of it, and then sell all of it when 1 of them sell 50%. Set stop loss to 10%.

starterQuestions.label: If any 2 people in #copytrade buy >$4000 of a token within 10 minutes of each other, buy me $100 of it, and then sell all of it when any 1 of them sell 50% OR when it increases by 50%. Set stop loss to 10%. Set stop loss to 10%.
starterQuestions.value: If any 2 people in #[copytrade|COPYTRADE_ID] buy >$4000 of a token within 10 minutes of each other, buy me $100 of it, and then sell all of it when any 1 of them sell 50% OR when it increases by 50%. Set stop loss to 10%. Set target to 0%.

starterQuestions.label: If any 3 people in #copytrade buy >$500 of a token within 15 minutes of each other, and it is <$1M marketcap, buy me $100 of it, and then sell all of it when any 2 of them sell 50% OR when it increases by 50%. Set stop loss to 10%.
starterQuestions.value: If any 3 people in #[copytrade|COPYTRADE_ID] buy >$500 of a token within 15 minutes of each other, and it is <$1M marketcap, buy me $100 of it, and then sell all of it when any 2 of them sell 50% OR when it increases by 50%. Set stop loss to 10%.

starterQuestions.label: If any 2 people in #copytrade buy >$500 of a token within 10 minutes of each other, and it is between $100k-$500k marketcap, buy me $100 of it, and then sell all of it when any of them sell 50% OR when it increases by 50%. Set stop loss to 10%
starterQuestions.value: If any 2 people in #[copytrade|COPYTRADE_ID] buy >$500 of a token within 10 minutes of each other, and it is between $100k-$500k marketcap, buy me $100 of it, and then sell all of it when any of them sell 50% OR when it increases by 50%. Set stop loss to 10%.

starterQuestions.label: If any 2 people in #copytrade buy >$500 of a token within 10 minutes of each other, and it was created <24 hours ago, buy me $100 of it, and then sell when they sell. Set stop loss to 10%
starterQuestions.value: If any 2 people in #[copytrade|COPYTRADE_ID] buy >$500 of a token within 10 minutes of each other, and it was created <24 hours ago, buy me $100 of it, and then sell when they sell. Set stop loss to 10%

name: @moxie-protocol/plugin-senpi-orders
description: Enables your agent to trade and swap for you onchain using your Agent Wallet, with instructions for profit-taking and stop losses, including laddered profits and stop losses.
capabilities: Swap any token on Base. 💡Pro Tip: use “$” to auto-complete token names
Spend a % of your wallet to buy coins
Buy on dip — buy a token when the price drops
Buy at target price — buy at target price
Sell at target price — sell at target price (all or some)
Take profits using profit ladders (see conversation starters for examples).
Set a stop loss, for all or some of the token
Apply profit taking or stop loss to any tokens already in your wallet

starterQuestions.label: Buy me $25 worth of $[replace with token name]
starterQuestions.value: Buy me $25 worth of $[replace with token name]

starterQuestions.label: Buy me $25 worth of $[TOKEN] and then sell all for 30% gain. Set stop loss at 25%.
starterQuestions.value: Buy me $25 worth of $[TOKEN] and then sell all for 30% gain. Set stop loss at 25%.

starterQuestions.label: Buy me $25 worth of $[TOKEN] and then sell 50% for 30% gain and the other 50% for 100% gain. Sell 50% for stop loss of 20% and 50% for stop loss of 40%.
starterQuestions.value: Buy me $25 worth of $[TOKEN] and then sell 50% for 30% gain and the other 50% for 100% gain. Sell 50% for stop loss of 20% and 50% for stop loss of 40%.

starterQuestions.label: Apply 30% stop loss on all of my $[TOKEN]
starterQuestions.value: Apply 30% stop loss on all of my $[TOKEN]

starterQuestions.label: Sell 30% of my $[TOKEN] if the price increases by 25% and then 30% more when the price increases by 50%
starterQuestions.value: Sell 30% of my $[TOKEN] if the price increases by 25% and then 30% more when the price increases by 50%
